Weather Station: Leipzig-Schkeuditz (latitude 51-25N, longitude 012-14E)

Local Time:

Leipzig-Schkeuditz is in the "Europe/Berlin" timezone.

The "Europe/Berlin" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in DST (since Sunday, 31 March 2024, 03:00 AM local time). During DST, the timezone abbreviation is CEST and the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +2:00 hours.

Leipzig-Schkeuditz will exit DST (returning to standard time) on Sunday, 27 October 2024, at 03:00 AM local time, when clocks will be turned backward 1 hour to Sunday, 27 October 2024, 02:00 AM local standard time. During ST, the timezone abbreviation is CET and the offset to UTC will be +1:00 hours.
